pages.text: Getting around in this world is almost impossible! I found a simple ceramic water bucket to be a safe way to go up and down - provided I am already on an upper plateau. I made a waterfall, which made it a breeze to travel up and down the different levels.$(br2)

pages.title: Scaffolding
pages.text: For those times I could not use a water ladder, scaffolding came to the rescue. Bamboo can be hard to find, but I found it was not hard to make (check JEI).

pages.title: Crafting Station
pages.text: Something cool. I found I could attach five inventories to a Crafting Station. I also discovered I could effectively split a crafting station in two!
